attributes.action: To make female's Sanitary towels and tampons free.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Women and young girl's once a month if not more have to go though a cycle.And as a women and a mum to girl's we have to buy certian thing's like Sanitary towels and tampons.It is not a treat it is a necessity.You can get condom's free from Family planning clinic.So i am asking for these to be free or a discount.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
